prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that embodies the beauty of nature with vibrant floral elements.
I want a cute Pokemon that has a gentle demeanor and is known for its healing abilities.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in lush green environments and has a strong bond with plants.
Make a quadrupedal Pokemon with a long neck and a colorful flower around its neck.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its floral design to attract other creatures and promote harmony.
Design a Pokemon that can manipulate plant life and has a tranquil personality.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the essence of spring with its green body and pink flower.

distinctive_features: Large pink flower on its neck
